title: No Longer Available: T206 EPDG Modecai Brown Portrait - SGC 50
author: robw1959

posts.post_title: No Longer Available: T206 EPDG Modecai Brown Portrait - SGC 50
posts.post_content: No Longer Available: Solid 4 grade on this underrated rare back. A couple of VGEX common back (Sweet Cap & Piedmont) Brown portraits sold on eBay earlier this year for an average price of $330. Asking $[STRIKE]495[/STRIKE] $425 delivered, PayPal preferred.
Let's drop the price to $425. Any takers at $425? Very solid card.
